mapper.select: SELECT a.vi_id,a.video_name,a.video_type,a.video_route,a.video_category,DATE_FORMAT(a.vedio_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS vedio_time,a.vedio_pic, b.item_id,c.item_name,c.item_price,d.item_brand_name FROM (SELECT * FROM vid_manage WHERE vi_id=#{viId}) a LEFT JOIN item_detail b ON a.video_route=b.video LEFT JOIN item_info c ON b.item_id=c.item_id LEFT JOIN item_brand d ON c.item_brand_id=d.item_brand_id
select video_route from vid_manage where vi_id=#{viId}
select a.item_id,a.item_name from item_info a,item_detail b where a.item_id=b.item_id and b.video=#{videoRout} limit 1
mapper.update: update vid_manage set play_num=play_num+1 where vi_id=#{viId}
update vid_manage set zan_num=zan_num+1 where vi_id=#{typeId}
update vid_manage set zan_num=zan_num-1 where vi_id=#{typeId}
